Description:
"Investors! Here Is Your Next Opportunity!"
Located in a quiet street, close to all amenities, including Corio Village Shopping Centre, schools & public transport all just a short walk or drive away! Just mins away from the ring road so perfect for commuters in Melbourne
-3 bedrooms with 2 living areas or 4 bedrooms with 1 living area
-All bedrooms are large in size
-A large family bathroom as well as second shower & toilet off the laundry
-Spacious kitchen, an abundance of cupboard space, breakfast bar & dishwasher!
-Light filled living/dining with coonara, timber flooring & ceiling fan
-Tenants currently paying $280.00 per week
-Single lock up garage under roof line with internal access
-Lots of storage
-Covered verandah out the back perfect for entertaining
-Spacious backyard
Perfect for an investor to sit back & reap the rewards or a first home buyer getting into the market! Inspect today!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Welcome to The Beautiful Coronet Bay!!
What an amazing opportunity to build your dream home on this 501m2 block titled and ready to go, set in a beautiful location of Coronet Bay offering a quality lifestyle for the family. This well sought-after estate is already home to many divine homes and this is your chance to be one of them.
Coronet Bay is only an approximate 80-minute drive from the Melbourne CBD, offering local produce, cafés, vineyards and restaurants. With many picturesque walking tracks, this property is approximately 300 meters to the beach and will suit anyone with a dream to be a permanent part of the Bass Coast. Close to the primary school, early childrens learning hub in Corinella, public transport making it easy for families with young children & teenagers.
Only a few minutes drive into the heart of the township Grantville, San Remo & Phillip Island attractions.
Please call Daniel or Tamara today so they can help you get started to build your new home or investment portfolio.

Description:
Coastal Sanctuary with Bay Views
Beautifully elevated with a northerly aspect that floods the home with natural light.
This accommodating home is located within an easy stroll of the beautiful Coronet Bay beach and coastal walking tracks.
Other highlights include split level living, three bedrooms with BIRs and carpet throughout, a modern kitchen and is perfectly positioned to service the family dining area, and a neutral colour palette and loads of storage. With a generous balcony providing magical views over a leafy outlook.
Large powered double garage.
Perfectly positioned on a generous allotment of 570m2 approx and if you want to enjoy the best of both worlds you can also purchase the block next door number 37 Norsemens Road that is offering a 676m2 approx.
Double garage with power
A terrific opportunity presents here for the first home buyer/ Invester to acquire the most affordable and well-presented piece of Coronet Bay Real Estate.
Open for inspections are allowed. Strict health and safety measures are in place.
To arrange to view this property please refer to virtual tour link, or call Daniel or Tamara of a live Video walkthrough.
Insights: 35 Norsemens Road, Coronet Bay VIC 3984 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 3 bedroom house in Coronet Bay have recently been sold.

Description:
BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME & ENJOY RELAXING RURAL VIEWS
If you like to look out onto rural views with the added luxury of living in a exciting yet relaxing beach community of Coronet Bay then look no further.
This block is approximately 663 Sqm with all services at the front and just a short walk to the beach there is also the option to purchase the dwelling next door and incorporate it into approximately 1200 sqm block with a huge shed and 3br dwelling.
Coronet Bay is an affordable beach community within the Western port waterline of the Bass Coast region. Offering National parks to beaches, Cafe's, fresh produce to public, family activities and much more spanning throughout.

Description:
SENSATIONAL SINGLE LEVEL BEACHSIDE LIVING
For those looking for something fresh, spacious & affordable, look no further!
If its a cute beachside escape you have been searching for, your search ends here!
For you are certain to feel right at home in this very special beachside home. Bathed in beautiful natural light companied by the gorgeous nautical-inspired colour scheme are just a few of the features that will have you dreaming of sun-filled summer days in your very own beachside property. The open plan living and dining adjoins both three main bedrooms of the home, as well as the two bathrooms, the master offering an ensuite and an outdoor patio courtyard area, allowing for a bright open feeling of spaciousness and connectivity throughout. A fully equipped kitchen also comes complete with modern appliances and lovely countertops whilst the rest of the home includes all of the everyday modern creature comforts one expects such as split system cooling, heating, and ceiling fans.
The garage has been converted into a family rumpus with the front of the garage offering storage.
This picture-perfect cutie offers everything for those looking for space to enjoy without the maintenance of a bigger block and more.
NOTE- CORONAVIRUS PRECAUTION: If you are unwell or displaying any flu like symptoms, please do not attend our open for inspection.
Contact Daniel or Tamara Leskie to arrange your private inspection or live streamed virtual inspection

Description:
STAGE 3 NOW TITLED - CORONET BAY ESTATE - 504sqm
This parcel of land is now Titled in Stage 3 Coronet Bay Estate, Bowline Court, Coronet Bay. On offer here is number 8 (Lot 61) Bowline Court, Coronet Bay - situated on approximately 504 square metres. This affordable parcel of land is ready for you to build your dream home on and enjoy the coastal lifestyle you have always wanted all while being brilliantly located within a five minute walk to the safe, sandy swimming beach. Coronet Bay offers the type of classic seaside lifestyle that many thought no longer existed. Build your dream home and enjoy the lifestyle you've always wanted, at a fraction of the cost. A 5 minute walk to the beach, local bus stop, community centre, basketball court, playground, bmx track and walking tracks.
Contact the team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today on 03 5678 8433 to arrange your inspection!

Description:
Great Value for Money
Here is an opportunity to plan for your future by securing this spacious residence in a position with a connection to everything Coronet Bay has to offer.
Whether youre looking for the perfect place to raise the growing family, or for your investment portfolio, this 560M2 ( approx. ) property provides a range of options.
This lovely home in a quiet location offers 3 good sized bedrooms all with built-in robes, reverse cycle air conditioning, spacious living area, meals area and bathroom with separate toilet.
Substantial front yard for the children to play and secure off-street parking for a few cars, large enclosed carport with remote control door and garage at the rear of the property.
Whether it be just a comfortable home or a holiday home, investment property, all within a short walk of all conveniences, this is a great home in a thriving beachside community.
To view this property please call Daniel or Tamara to arrange a private appointment or live video walkthrough.

Description:
Character and Charm with WOW FACTOR!!
This fully renovated and freshly painted home with floating floors on a 589sqm block instantly beckons an inspection with a welcoming bull nose veranda and front porch. Upon entering this appealing home the first thing that grabs your attention is the fantastic living zones. Both of the spacious rooms have wall to wall bi-fold doors that open out to a full width rear deck, perfect for getting together with family and friends and entertaining. The open plan kitchen facing the deck has electric cooking, stainless steel appliances, deep cupboards and a large island bench with stone top, all in a modern, high gloss finish that compliments the rest of the renovations. The house still retains some of its original charm with ornate skirting, leadlight front door and high ceilings, exuding a feeling of homeliness and warmth.
The 3 generous bedrooms with built in robes and large windows to bring in natural light are at the front of the home, and the bathroom, powder room and ensuite have all been updated as well. There are two split system heating/cooling units to keep year round temperatures at desired levels and access from the carport into the house makes getting the groceries in easy on a rainy day. A fully enclosed rear yard with 7ft fencing assures privacy, with plenty of room for play space or shedding. A wide driveway with a turning angle in it leads to the carport that is fitted with sensor lights. The low maintenance front garden is designed to leave you with more time to spend doing the things you love. The Coronet Bay safe swimming beach is 5 minutes away as are the licensed general store/post office and newly opened chemist. Major shopping centres are within 25 minutes and the dual lane Bass Highway makes commuting easy in either direction. There is a local Primary School and long Day Care Centre nearby, add all these amenities together and you will see that this property is in the ideal location for the sort of lifestyle that only the country and coast can offer.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
BEACHFRONT BLISS WITH PANORAMIC VIEWS
Awe-inspiring unobstructed views over Westernport Bay creates a spectacular backdrop to this character filled beachfront home and sets the scene for an unbeatable lifestyle! Watch the sun set over the water every night from the comfort of your home, take advantage of the open parkland right out your backdoor and enjoy the peacefulness of being located at the end of the court. This hardiplank home features 4 good size bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, elongated garage, single carport, open plan kitchen/ meals area downstairs and a retreat upstairs, both with access their own deck areas!

On offer here is number 17 (Lot 68) Bowline Court, Coronet Bay - situated on approximately 454 square metres. This affordable parcel of land is ready for you to build your dream home on and enjoy the coastal lifestyle you have always wanted all while being brilliantly located within a five minute walk to the safe, sandy swimming beach.
Coronet Bay offers the type of classic seaside lifestyle that many thought no longer existed. Be surrounded by the unspoilt tranquility of nature, yet, at only 20 minutes to Wonthaggi, 40 minutes to Pakenham and 80 minutes from the CBD, connected to everything you need.
At just a fraction of the cost you could afford your very own brand new home that is walking distance to the beach, local bus stop, community centre, basketball court, playground, BMX track and walking tracks.

Address: 24 Bass Horizon Promenade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
NEAR NEW HOME ONLY A SHORT WALK TO THE BEACH
Contemporary floorplan over two levels, upstairs with open plan kitchen and living area, 2-bathroom room, balcony area to relax and enjoy the stunning water views.
The home is only approximately 36 months old and is covered by the building warranty. The home offers 3 bedrooms with BIRs Generous Double garage and plenty of room for boat or caravan.
Located in a serene position and walking distance to the beach, hiking trails, just a short drive to the local wineries, Phillip Island and all the wonderful activities Bass coast has to offer
This home is located in a well sort after Zone of Coronet Bay & 20 Minutes to the world-famous GP track, Penguin parade, and much more, including a great lifestyle. This could suite as the Ideal permanent home for the whole family or beach holiday home - Or investment opportunity in the holiday rental space.
Open for inspections are allowed. Strict health and safety measures are in place.
To view this amazing property please contact Tamara & Daniel
